name: vscode-test
description: A configurable test-runner for multiple file types.

vscode-test.maximizeTerminal.description: Maximizes the test runner terminal when a command is run

vscode-test.runAllTestsCommand.description: Defines a command to run for all tests (i.e. 'bin/rails test:system test', 'mix test')

vscode-test.runAllUnitTestsCommand.description: Defines a command to run for all unit tests (i.e. 'bin/rails test')

vscode-test.rubyTestCommand.description: Defines a test command to use for ruby files.

vscode-test.rubyTestDirectory.description: Define the directory for ruby tests.

vscode-test.rubyTestDirectoryLocal.description: If you run your tests e.g. in a docker environment, you may specify an alternative path for opening the file in the editor. Defaults to `vscode-test.rubyTestDirectory`.

vscode-test.rubyTestPattern.description: Define the pattern for ruby test files.

vscode-test.elixirTestCommand.description: Defines a test command to use for elixir files.

vscode-test.elixirTestDirectory.description: Define the directory for elixir tests.

vscode-test.elixirTestDirectoryLocal.description: If you run your tests e.g. in a docker environment, you may specify an alternative path for opening the file in the editor. Defaults to `vscode-test.elixirTestDirectory`.

vscode-test.elixirTestPattern.description: Define the pattern for elixir test files.

vscode-test.typescriptTestCommand.description: Defines a test command to use for typescript files.

vscode-test.typescriptTestDirectory.description: Define the directory for typescript tests.

vscode-test.typescriptTestDirectoryLocal.description: If you run your tests e.g. in a docker environment, you may specify an alternative path for opening the file in the editor. Defaults to `vscode-test.typescriptTestDirectory`.

vscode-test.typescriptTestPattern.description: Define the pattern for typescript test files.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
